data.system_settings: iPhone XS Max, iOS 12.1.1 Dev Beta 3
data.actual_result: Server icon movement speed varies depending on where the icon is
data.expected_result: Dragged server icons should move at a consistent speed regardless of where they are
data.short_description: Server icons move at inconsistent speeds depending on where they are
data.steps_to_repro: - Drag a server icon quickly between the other icons and observe how it moves slower than your finger to allow for the reordering animation - Drag the icon to the top (above the the DM/friends icon and observe that it is delayed, like when moving between other server icons - Drag to the very bottom of the server list and drag over the button to create/join a server and observe how the movement of the icon you're dragging is synchronised with the location of your finger in real time, unlike it was in the previous 2 steps
